name: ///Legend
description:
Legends are the backbone of the illegal world.
You need contraband trafficked? Done.
You need a person trafficked? Done.
Need a high society worm dead rotting
in the back of a trunk and or left in an alley?

Done.

Probably a street kid who made it into the major leagues,
or some snot nosed Richie rich punk who got sick of champagne
and caviar, Who cares. you know the biz and the biz got tired of you.

Legends are the standard in the solar system.
But seeing as you are caught in this prison about
to be sent to god knows where, you are down on your luck.
